get

public void get(CD cd)
Description copied from interface: CDPut
Get the latest value of the target data. The record will NOT be processed before the data is read. If the request fails then CDPutRequester.getDone is called before get returns.

Specified by:
get in interface CDPut
Parameters:
cd - The CD into which the data should be put.

put

public void put(CD cd)
Description copied from interface: CDPut
Get the latest value of the target data. If the request fails then CDPutRequester.putDone is called before put returns.

Specified by:
put in interface CDPut
Parameters:
cd - The CD from which to get the data.

nextDelayedPutField

public boolean nextDelayedPutField(org.epics.pvData.pv.PVField field)
Description copied from interface: ChannelPutRequester
Called as a result of a call to ChannelPut.nextPutField that returns true, The underlying database is locked while this is called.

Specified by:
nextDelayedPutField in interface ChannelPutRequester
Parameters:
field - The data.
Returns:
(false,true) if the requester (will not, will) call PutFactory.nextDelayedPutField again for this pvField.

nextPutField

public boolean nextPutField(ChannelField channelField,
                            org.epics.pvData.pv.PVField pvField)
Description copied from interface: ChannelPutRequester
Provide the next set of data to put to the channel. The requester is expected to call the put method.

Specified by:
nextPutField in interface ChannelPutRequester
Parameters:
channelField - The channelField.
pvField - The interface for putting data.
Returns:
(false,true) if the requester (has,has not) obtained all the data. A value of true means that the requester wants to be called again for this data. The caller must call ChannelPut.nextDelayedPutField in order to access more data. This normally means that an array is being transfered and the requester is not able to handle the array as a single chunk of data.

putDone

public void putDone(RequestResult requestResult)
Description copied from interface: ChannelPutRequester
The request is done. This is always called with no locks held.

Specified by:
putDone in interface ChannelPutRequester
Parameters:
requestResult - The result of the request.

getDone

public void getDone(RequestResult requestResult)
Description copied from interface: ChannelGetRequester
The request is done. This is always called with no locks held.

Specified by:
getDone in interface ChannelGetRequester
Parameters:
requestResult - The result of the request.

nextDelayedGetField

public boolean nextDelayedGetField(org.epics.pvData.pv.PVField pvField)
Description copied from interface: ChannelGetRequester
Called as a result of a call to Get.getDelayed, The underlying database is locked and this is called.

Specified by:
nextDelayedGetField in interface ChannelGetRequester
Parameters:
pvField - The data.
Returns:
(false,true) if the requester (will not, will) call Get.getDelayed again for this pvField.

nextGetField

public boolean nextGetField(ChannelField channelField,
                            org.epics.pvData.pv.PVField pvField)
Description copied from interface: ChannelGetRequester
Next data for a get request.

Specified by:
nextGetField in interface ChannelGetRequester
Parameters:
channelField - The channelField.
pvField - The data.
Returns:
(false,true) if the requester (has,has not) obtained all the data. A value of true means that the requester has not retrieved all the data. The caller must call Get.getDelayed in order to access more data. The getDelayed call will result in nextDelayedGetData being called. This normally means that an array is being transfered and the requester is not able to handle the array as a single chunk of data.
